text: Thomas Christopher HenryMayor Tom Henry (biography), The Waynedale News, September 1, 2009 (November 8, 1951 â€“ March 28, 2024) was an American businessman and politician. He was the 35th Mayor of Fort Wayne, Indiana from 2008 until his death in 2024. He the city's longest-serving mayor. Henry was a member of the Democratic Party. He was born in Fort Wayne. In 1975, Henry married Cindy Kocks. They had two children. Kocks died of cancer in January 2024. In late February 2024, Henry announced that he had been diagnosed with terminal stomach cancer. He died a month later on March 28 under hospice care in Fort Wayne, at the age of 72. ==References== ==Other websites== * Mayor signs "light pollution" revision Category:1951 births Category:2024 deaths Category:Deaths from stomach cancer Category:American mayors Category:People from Fort Wayne, Indiana Category:Businesspeople from Indiana Category:Politicians from Indiana Category:Democratic Party (United States) politicians
